actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Colorado River Storage Project Act in order to remove the prohibition against constructing dams or reservoirs authorized in such act within national parks or monuments.

summary.text: Removes the prohibition under the Colorado River Storage Project Act against constructing dams or reservoirs within national parks or monuments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Colorado River Storage Project Act in order to remove the prohibition against constructing dams or reservoirs authorized in such act within national parks or monuments.
